title: TaskSnapshot
description: Full snapshot of a swarm task including all role outputs.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the task was created.

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last status update.

planningOutput.description: Output produced by the planner role.

buildOutput.description: Output produced by the builder role.

reviewOutput.description: Output produced by the reviewer role.

summary.description: Final summary when the task is completed.

error.description: Error message when the task has failed.

parentTaskId.description: Identifier of the parent task, if this is a sub-task.

childTaskIds.description: Identifiers of child sub-tasks spawned by this task.
